import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Swap asset owner via advanced deployment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/owner/requestor/swap"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets asset ownership with advanced deployment swap logic. This endpoint is used in scenarios where ownership needs to be transferred as part of an advanced deployment workflow, such as device exchange programs.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify the asset and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **OwnerId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the user and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with tag or serial filter.
2. Search for new owner: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) with name or email.
3. Call [POST /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/owner/requestor/swap](/docs/api/assets/set-asset-owner-advanced-deployment-swap) to transfer ownership.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path), `OwnerId` (body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to set or transfer ownership of an asset. Supports transferring ownership from one asset to another, or assigning a new owner directly.","properties":{"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the new owner (user). Obtain from POST /api/v1.0/users search."},"FromAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership from"},"FromAssetStatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Status to set on the 'from' asset after transfer"},"FromAssetReason":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Reason for removing ownership from the 'from' asset"},"ToAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership to"},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Associated ticket UUID for the ownership change"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product context for the operation"},"ToAssetReason":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Reason for assigning ownership to the target asset"},"Force":{"type":"boolean","description":"Force the ownership change even if validations would normally prevent it","default":false},"Source":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Source system or integration initiating the change"},"UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"description":"When true, update the asset's location to match the new owner's location"},"UpdateAssetWithUserRoom":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"description":"When true, update the asset's room to match the new owner's room"},"SkipRulesProcessing":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, bypass rule engine processing for this change","default":false},"DueDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Expected return date for checked-out assets"},"InventoryOptions":{"nullable":true,"description":"Inventory-related options for the ownership change","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Options for inventory-related operations when changing asset ownership or location.","properties":{"Quantity":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Quantity of inventory items to transfer"},"ToEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target entity UUID for the inventory transfer"},"ToEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity type UUID of the target entity"},"ToLocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target location UUID for the inventory transfer"},"ToLocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Target room UUID within the location"}},"title":"AssetInventoryOptions"}],"type":"object"}},"title":"SetAssetOwnerRequest"},"example":{"OwnerId":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":true,"Force":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
